section.ja: 農学部 生物資源学科
section.en: Faculty of Agriculture Department of Bioresources

research_field.ja: 環境政策、環境配慮型社会

paper_title.en: Instrumental neutron activation analysis of extractable organohalogens in the Antarctic Weddell seal (Leptonychotes weddelli)

description.en: Instrumental neutron activation analysis (INAA) was performed for measurement of extractable organohalogens (EOX) in blubber samples of Weddell seals (Leptonychotes weddelli) from Antarctica. EOX were detected in all the analyzed samples. The concentration order of EOX was: extractable organochlorine (EOCl)> extractable organobromine (EOBr)> extractable organoiodine (EOI). Their levels increased gradually with aging as with other man-made persistent organic pollutants (POPs) such as PCBs and DDTs.

publication_name.en: JOURNAL OF RADIOANALYTICAL AND NUCLEAR CHEMISTRY

paper_title.en: Instrumental neutron activation analysis of extractable organohalogens in the Antarctic Weddell seal (Leptonychotes weddelli)

description.en: Instrumental neutron activation analysis (INAA) was performed for measurement of extractable organohalogens (EOX) in blubber samples of Weddell seals (Leptonychotes weddelli) from Antarctica. EOX were detected in all the analyzed samples. The concentration order of EOX was: extractable organochlorine (EOCl)> extractable organobromine (EOBr)> extractable organoiodine (EOI). Their levels increased gradually with aging as with other man-made persistent organic pollutants (POPs) such as PCBs and DDTs.

publication_name.en: JOURNAL OF RADIOANALYTICAL AND NUCLEAR CHEMISTRY

paper_title.en: PCBs and organochlorine pesticides (OCPs) in edible fish and shellfish from China

description.en: A wide variety of fish and shellfish were collected from local supermarkets of Dalian, Tianjin and Shanghai in China and analyzed for the concentrations of polychlorinated biphenyls (PCBs) and organochlorine pesticides (OCPs) such as hexachlorobenzene (HCB), hexachlorocyclohexane isomers (HCHs), chlordane compounds (CHLs, including transchlordane, eis-chlordane, trans-nonachlor and cis-nonachlor) and dichlorodiphenyltrichloroethane (DDT) and its metabolites (DDTs, including o,p'-DDE, p,p'-DDE, o,p'-DDD, p,p'-DDD, o,p'-DDT and p,p-DDT). Concentrations of PCBs in samples collected from Dalian, Tianjin and Shanghai ranged from 1.11 to 8.04 ng/g, 1.26 to 5.60 ng/g and 0.83 to 11.4 ng/g on wet weight basis, respectively. The concentrations were lower compared to those in developed countries such as Japan and Italy. Average concentrations of HCB, HCHs, CHLs and DDTs were 0.38, 0.92, 0.47 and 28.9 ng/g on wet weight basis, respectively. The daily intake of PCBs and organochlorine pesticides ingested by people living in these cities in China through fish and shellfish was estimated and compared with those observed in other areas. (c) 2005 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.ja: ヒト血液中PCBs水酸化代謝物に関する研究 -母体血及び臍帯血中の濃度レベルと母子間移行
paper_title.en: Hydroxylated Polychlorinated Biphenyl Metabolites (HO-PCBs) in Human Blood : The Concentration Level in Maternal Blood and her Umbilical Cord Blood, and Transferred Across the Placenta from a Mother to Fetus

description.ja:
HO-PCBsはPCBsの代謝物であり, 甲状腺ホルモンの撹乱を引き起こすことが疑われている。胎児・乳幼児期の中枢神経の発達に甲状腺ホルモンはきわめて重要であることが指摘され, HO-PCBsが脳機能の発達に悪影響を及ぼすことが懸念される。本研究では, PCBs及びHO-PCBsの胎児・乳幼児期での母子間移行と曝露評価を行なうことを目的に, 妊婦より提供された母体血及び臍帯血のHO-PCBs, PCBsの濃度レベルを明らかにした。
HO-PCBsの6種の異性体が全て母体血及び臍帯血から検出された。このうち4-HO-CB107, 4-HO-CB146, 4-HO-CB187の3異性体が母体血及び臍帯血中の主要異性体であり, 4-HO-CB187≫4-HO-CB146>4-HO-CB107の濃度順位で検出された。母体血及び臍帯血中に含まれる総HO-PCBs濃度は, それぞれ16～92pg/g湿重 (中央値42pg/g湿重) , 8.7～87pg/g湿重 (中央値24pg/g湿重) であり, 総濃度に占める主要3異性体の割合は合計で母体血79%, 臍帯血72%であった。臍帯血中のPCBsの濃度レベルは, 母体血に比べ約1/5のレベルに減少していたが, HO-PCBsは母体血 [に対し近い濃度レベルで臍帯血中に存在していた。胎児は母体に近い濃度レベルで胎児期にHO-PCBsより曝露されていることが考えられ, 脳の発育段階である胎児期での曝露は, 脳の機能発達において何らかの影響を与える可能性が考えられる。
description.en:
Hydroxylated polychlorinated biphenyls (HO-PCBs) are metabolites formed via cytochrome P-450-mediated oxidation of polychlorinated biphenyls (PCBs), and suspected of disrupting thyroid hormone function.
This study was aimed to determine the concentration level of HO-PCBs in the maternal blood and her umbilical cord blood, and evaluate the transfer of those compounds across the placenta.
The total HO-PCBs concentration ranged 16-92 pg/g wet weight (median 42 pg/g wet weight) in the maternal blood and 8.7-87 pg/g wet weight (median 24 pg/g wet weight) in the umbilical cord blood. Although the concentration level of PCBs in the umbilical cord blood was one-fifth as high as that in the maternal blood, the concentration level of HO-PCBs were detected at the same level in umbilical cord blood and the maternal blood.
It suggests that the fetus would be exposed to HO-PCBs at the same level as their mother in the sensitive stage of development.

publication_name.ja: 日本環境化学会環境化学

paper_title.ja: ヒト血液中PCBs水酸化代謝物(HO-PCBs)に関する研究 -分析法の検討及び日本人健常者における濃度レベルと蓄積特性-
paper_title.en: Hydroxylated Polychlorinated Biphenyl Metabolites (HO-PCBs) in Human Blood Plasma : Development of Analytical Methods and their Residue in Japanese General Population

description.ja: PCBsは生体内において, チトクロムP450による酸化によりHO-PCBsに代謝され, 甲状腺ホルモンの撹乱を引き起こすことが疑われている。本研究ではPCBsとHO-PCBsの同時分析法の確立を行い, 日本人のヒト血漿試料に適用した。ヒト血漿中では4-HO-CB107 (10～230pg/g wet weight) , 4-HO-CB146 (13～340pg/g wet weight) , 4-HO-CB187 (12～110pg/g wet weight) の3異性体が血漿中の主要異性体として検出された。HO-PCBとそれらの親PCBsの血漿中での存在比 (HO-PCB/親PCBs) は1/10～1であった。検討したHO-PCBsのうち, 4-HO-CB107, 4-HO-CB187はそれら親PCBsと同じレベルで比較的高濃度で血漿中に存在していた。本実験で供した試料はすべて日本人であるが, これまで報告されている欧米の濃度レベルと比較して低いレベルであった。これらの差はPCBsの暴露量や代謝能力の違いによるものと考えられる。
description.en:
Hydroxylated polychlorinated biphenyl metabolites (HO-PCBs) are formed via cytochrome P-450-mediated oxidation of individual polychlorinated biphenyl (PCB) congeners, and they are retained selectively in the bloods. HO-PCBs are suspected to disrupt thyroid hormone function.
This study was aimed to develop the simultaneous analytical method of HO-PCBs and PCBs, and to determine the concentrations of HO-PCBs and PCBs in the human blood plasma from Japanese.
Three major congeners and their levels in the samples were 4-HO-2, 3, 3', 4', 5-PentaCB (4-HO-CB107) 10-230 pg/g wet weight, 4-HO-2, 2; 3, 4', 5, 5'-HexaCB (4-HO-CB146) 13-340 pg/g wet weight and 4-H0-2, 2', 3, 4', 5, 5', 6-HeptaCB (4-HO-CB187) 12-110 pg/g wet weight. The ratio of ΣHO-PCBs to ΣPCBs was about 1 to 1/10 in the human blood plasma. The concentrations of 4-HO-CB 107 and 4-HO-CB 187 were similar and comparable to their corresponding parent compounds. The concentrations determined in the present study are lower than the data reported previously in Europe and USA. The difference might be attributable to the differences in exposure levels to PCBs and in metabolic abilities of the people in each country.

publication_name.ja: 日本環境化学会環境化学

paper_title.ja: ヒト血液中PCBs水酸化代謝物に関する研究 : 母体血及び臍帯血中の濃度レベルと母子間移行
paper_title.en: Hydroxylated polychlorinated biphenyl metabolites (HO-PCBs) in human blood -The concentration levels in maternal blood and her umbilical cord blood, and transferred across the placenta from a mother to fetus-

paper_title.ja: ヒト血液中PCBs水酸化代謝物(HO-PCBs)に関する研究 : 分析法の検討及び日本人健常者における濃度レベルと蓄積特性
paper_title.en: Hydroxylated polychlorinated biphenyl metabolites (HO-PCBs) in human blood plasma -Development of analytical methods and their residue in Japanese general population-

description.ja: PCBsは生体内において, チトクロムP450による酸化によりHO-PCBsに代謝され, 甲状腺ホルモンの撹乱を引き起こすことが疑われている。本研究ではPCBsとHO-PCBsの同時分析法の確立を行い, 日本人のヒト血漿試料に適用した。ヒト血漿中では4-HO-CB107 (10～230pg/g wet weight) , 4-HO-CB146 (13～340pg/g wet weight) , 4-HO-CB187 (12～110pg/g wet weight) の3異性体が血漿中の主要異性体として検出された。HO-PCBとそれらの親PCBsの血漿中での存在比 (HO-PCB/親PCBs) は1/10～1であった。検討したHO-PCBsのうち, 4-HO-CB107, 4-HO-CB187はそれら親PCBsと同じレベルで比較的高濃度で血漿中に存在していた。本実験で供した試料はすべて日本人であるが, これまで報告されている欧米の濃度レベルと比較して低いレベルであった。これらの差はPCBsの暴露量や代謝能力の違いによるものと考えられる。

paper_title.ja: 中国産魚貝類に残留するPCBs及び有機塩素系農薬類
中国渤海沿岸域の魚貝類中のPCDDs、PCDFs及びCo-PCBs
paper_title.en: PCDDs, PCDFs and Coplanar PCBs in Fish and Shellfish from Coastal Area of Bohai Sea, China

description.ja:
近年, 中国経済は目ざましい発展を遂げているが, それとともに人間活動に伴う化学物質による環境汚染が懸念される。本研究は汚染されている中国の北東部にある渤海に着目し, その沿岸域の都市である大連, 青島, 煙台, 天津及び庄河で採取した魚類, 貝類中のダイオキシン類を測定し, 濃度レベルを明らかにするとともにその給源について検討した。その結果, 大連で採取した魚類のTEQ値は日本沿岸の魚貝類より低かった。他方, これらの地域で採取した貝類のTEQ値は日本の沿岸で採取した貝類と同レベルであった。魚類のPCDFs異性体パターンは貝類と異なっていた。魚類より代謝能力の弱い貝類には2, 3, 7, 8-PCDFsとともに, 非2, 3, 7, 8-PCDFsもより蓄積していたことに対し, 魚類には2, 3, 7, 8-PCDFsに比べて, 非2, 3, 7, 8-PCDFsの割合が極めて低かった。非2, 3, 7, 8-PCDFsのほうが魚類によってより代謝されやすいことを示唆している。魚貝類中のPCDDsのTEQへの寄与率について, 2, 3, 7, 8-TeCDDと1, 2, 3, 7, 8-PeCDDが高い寄与率を示した。また, PCDFsのTEQへの寄与率について, 2, 3, 7, 8-TeCDFと2, 3, 4, 7, 8-PeCDFが高い寄与率を示した。さらに, Co-PCBsのTEQへの寄与率に関して, IUPAC #126 PCBの寄与率が圧倒的に高く, Co-PCBsのTEQ値の73～95%を占めていた。
主成分分析の結果, PCDD/DFsの汚染源は主に都市の一般廃棄物の焼却由来と考えられ, PCPの不純物OCDDがPCDDsの給源として寄与していることも考えられる。Co-PCBsの汚染源としてはKC-500に相当するPCB製剤の使用, 漏出などが考えられる。本研究で得られた魚類, 貝類中のダイオキシン類濃度は低レベルであった。しかし, 今後, 渤海沿岸域での産業活動がさらに活発化すると, 魚類, 貝類中のダイオキシン類の汚染レベルは上昇することが考えられる。
description.en:
Fish and shellfish were collected from local supermarket and coastal area of Dalian, local supermarkets of Qingdao, Yantai, Tianjin and Zhuanghe surrounding polluted Bohai Sea in China and analyzed for the concentrations of PCDDs, PCDFs and Co-PCBs. Average concentrations of PCDDs, PCDFs and Co-PCBs in fish samples were 0.192, 0.357 and 368 pg/g on wet weight basis, respectively. Average value of total TEQ obtained from the analysis of fish samples was 0.340 pg-TEQ/g on wet weight basis which is lower compared to fish samples collected from coastal area of Japan. In the case of shellfish samples, average value of total TEQ in the samples collected from Dalian, Qingdao, Yantai, Tianjin and Zhuanghe was 0.149, 0.126, 0.124, 0.116 and 0.032 pg-TEQ/g on wet weight basis, respectively. These values of TEQ seem to be similar to those in shellfish samples collected from coastal areas of Japan.
The residue profiles of PCDFs in shellfish were different from those in fish. Compared to 2, 3, 7, 8-PCDFs, more non-2, 3, 7, 8-PCDFs were metabolized by fish. In addition, in fish and shellfish samples analyzed in this study, higher contributors to TEQ value of PCDDs were 2, 3, 7, 8-TeCDD and 1, 2, 3, 7, 8-PeCDD, higher contributors to TEQ value of PCDFs were 2, 3, 7, 8-TeCDF and 2, 3, 4, 7, 8-PeCDF Furthermore, IUPAC # 126 PCB was the highest contributor to TEQ value of Co-PCBs among all congeners of Co-PCBs determined.
According to profiles of individual isomers of PCDD/DFs detected in shellfish samples, it could be considered that incineration is the main sources of PCDD/DFs. Alike, it could be considered that use and leaching of commercial PCB products (# 1PCB and # 2PCB made by China, equivalent to KC-300 and KC-500, respectively) were the main sources of Co-PCBs.

publication_name.ja: 日本環境化学会環境化学

paper_title.ja: 河川水中のエストロゲン様活性物質による汚濁の総合評価
paper_title.en: Evaluation of Pollution by Estrogenic Activity Compounds in River Water

description.ja: 様々な化学物質とエストロゲンレセプターとの結合親和性を測定することによって, 合成女性ホルモンの一つであるDESを基準にしたエストロゲン様活性係数 (EAF) を求めた。複数のエストロゲン様物質共存下での結合親和性試験結果から, 複合汚染における影響は相加的であると推察された。環境中のエストロゲン様物質濃度にそれぞれのEAF値を乗じた値を加算して求めたエストロゲン様活性等量 (EAEQ) による汚濁評価を試みた。その結果, 人畜由来による汚濁寄与よりも合成化学物質系の寄与が大きい可能性が示唆された。
description.en: Endocrine disrupting chemicals and natural estrogens exist in aquatic environment and disrupt the endocrine system of aquatic organisms. Consequently, in order to evaluate the estrogenic activity of these compounds, we have investigated relative binding affinity of estrogen receptors (α and β) of some endocrine disruptor and estrogens, and derived a estrogen receptor binding activity factor (EAF) which is expressed in values relatively to a standard material, diethylstilbestrol (DES) . In regard to the EAF, which is based on the principle of TEF (dioxins), basic assumption is that the estrogenic activity of different chemicals are additive, and results of our present study support this assumption. Estrogen activity equivalent (EAEQ) value in water sample is calculated chemical residue data and their EAFs. The evaluation based on EAEQ was applied for the river water collected in Matsuyama Plain. The results show that the EAEQ values derived from endocrine disruptors are higher than those of estrogen compounds derived from humans and animals. EAF and EAEQ are useful tool evaluate the pollution caused by endocrine disruptors and to take a plan for reduction of the pollution.

publication_name.ja: 日本環境化学会環境化学

paper_title.ja: 中国渤海沿岸域の魚貝類中のPCDDs, PCDFs及びCo-PCBs
paper_title.en: PCDDs, PCDFs and coplanar PCBs in fish and shellfish from coastal area of Bohai Sea, China

description.ja:
近年, 中国経済は目ざましい発展を遂げているが, それとともに人間活動に伴う化学物質による環境汚染が懸念される。本研究は汚染されている中国の北東部にある渤海に着目し, その沿岸域の都市である大連, 青島, 煙台, 天津及び庄河で採取した魚類, 貝類中のダイオキシン類を測定し, 濃度レベルを明らかにするとともにその給源について検討した。その結果, 大連で採取した魚類のTEQ値は日本沿岸の魚貝類より低かった。他方, これらの地域で採取した貝類のTEQ値は日本の沿岸で採取した貝類と同レベルであった。魚類のPCDFs異性体パターンは貝類と異なっていた。魚類より代謝能力の弱い貝類には2, 3, 7, 8-PCDFsとともに, 非2, 3, 7, 8-PCDFsもより蓄積していたことに対し, 魚類には2, 3, 7, 8-PCDFsに比べて, 非2, 3, 7, 8-PCDFsの割合が極めて低かった。非2, 3, 7, 8-PCDFsのほうが魚類によってより代謝されやすいことを示唆している。魚貝類中のPCDDsのTEQへの寄与率について, 2, 3, 7, 8-TeCDDと1, 2, 3, 7, 8-PeCDDが高い寄与率を示した。また, PCDFsのTEQへの寄与率について, 2, 3, 7, 8-TeCDFと2, 3, 4, 7, 8-PeCDFが高い寄与率を示した。さらに, Co-PCBsのTEQへの寄与率に関して, IUPAC #126 PCBの寄与率が圧倒的に高く, Co-PCBsのTEQ値の73～95%を占めていた。
主成分分析の結果, PCDD/DFsの汚染源は主に都市の一般廃棄物の焼却由来と考えられ, PCPの不純物OCDDがPCDDsの給源として寄与していることも考えられる。Co-PCBsの汚染源としてはKC-500に相当するPCB製剤の使用, 漏出などが考えられる。本研究で得られた魚類, 貝類中のダイオキシン類濃度は低レベルであった。しかし, 今後, 渤海沿岸域での産業活動がさらに活発化すると, 魚類, 貝類中のダイオキシン類の汚染レベルは上昇することが考えられる。
description.en:
Fish and shellfish were collected from local supermarket and coastal area of Dalian, local supermarkets of Qingdao, Yantai, Tianjin and Zhuanghe surrounding polluted Bohai Sea in China and analyzed for the concentrations of PCDDs, PCDFs and Co-PCBs. Average concentrations of PCDDs, PCDFs and Co-PCBs in fish samples were 0.192, 0.357 and 368 pg/g on wet weight basis, respectively. Average value of total TEQ obtained from the analysis of fish samples was 0.340 pg-TEQ/g on wet weight basis which is lower compared to fish samples collected from coastal area of Japan. In the case of shellfish samples, average value of total TEQ in the samples collected from Dalian, Qingdao, Yantai, Tianjin and Zhuanghe was 0.149, 0.126, 0.124, 0.116 and 0.032 pg-TEQ/g on wet weight basis, respectively. These values of TEQ seem to be similar to those in shellfish samples collected from coastal areas of Japan.
The residue profiles of PCDFs in shellfish were different from those in fish. Compared to 2, 3, 7, 8-PCDFs, more non-2, 3, 7, 8-PCDFs were metabolized by fish. In addition, in fish and shellfish samples analyzed in this study, higher contributors to TEQ value of PCDDs were 2, 3, 7, 8-TeCDD and 1, 2, 3, 7, 8-PeCDD, higher contributors to TEQ value of PCDFs were 2, 3, 7, 8-TeCDF and 2, 3, 4, 7, 8-PeCDF Furthermore, IUPAC # 126 PCB was the highest contributor to TEQ value of Co-PCBs among all congeners of Co-PCBs determined.
According to profiles of individual isomers of PCDD/DFs detected in shellfish samples, it could be considered that incineration is the main sources of PCDD/DFs. Alike, it could be considered that use and leaching of commercial PCB products (# 1PCB and # 2PCB made by China, equivalent to KC-300 and KC-500, respectively) were the main sources of Co-PCBs.

publication_name.ja: 環境化学 : journal of environmental chemistry
publication_name.en: Japan Society of Environmental ChemistryJournal of Environmental Chemistry

paper_title.ja: 河川水中のエストロゲン様活性物質による汚濁の総合評価
paper_title.en: Evaluation of pollution by estrogenic activity compounds in river water

description.ja: 様々な化学物質とエストロゲンレセプターとの結合親和性を測定することによって, 合成女性ホルモンの一つであるDESを基準にしたエストロゲン様活性係数 (EAF) を求めた。複数のエストロゲン様物質共存下での結合親和性試験結果から, 複合汚染における影響は相加的であると推察された。環境中のエストロゲン様物質濃度にそれぞれのEAF値を乗じた値を加算して求めたエストロゲン様活性等量 (EAEQ) による汚濁評価を試みた。その結果, 人畜由来による汚濁寄与よりも合成化学物質系の寄与が大きい可能性が示唆された。
description.en: Endocrine disrupting chemicals and natural estrogens exist in aquatic environment and disrupt the endocrine system of aquatic organisms. Consequently, in order to evaluate the estrogenic activity of these compounds, we have investigated relative binding affinity of estrogen receptors (α and β) of some endocrine disruptor and estrogens, and derived a estrogen receptor binding activity factor (EAF) which is expressed in values relatively to a standard material, diethylstilbestrol (DES) . In regard to the EAF, which is based on the principle of TEF (dioxins), basic assumption is that the estrogenic activity of different chemicals are additive, and results of our present study support this assumption. Estrogen activity equivalent (EAEQ) value in water sample is calculated chemical residue data and their EAFs. The evaluation based on EAEQ was applied for the river water collected in Matsuyama Plain. The results show that the EAEQ values derived from endocrine disruptors are higher than those of estrogen compounds derived from humans and animals. EAF and EAEQ are useful tool evaluate the pollution caused by endocrine disruptors and to take a plan for reduction of the pollution.

paper_title.en: Dioxin-like potencies and extractable organohalogens (EOX) in medical, municipal and domestic waste incinerator ashes in Japan

description.en: Ash samples collected from medical, municipal and small-scale domestic incinerators in Japan were tested for dioxin-like activity using bioassay technique (ethoxyresorufin-O-deethylase: EROD assay) and for extractable organo-halogens (EOX) using instrumental neutron activation analysis in order to estimate potential toxicity and responsible chemicals in those samples. Crude extracts and fractions cleaned-up for dioxin analysis from the samples were used for the analysis. The ranges of dioxins in the ashes were between 2.23 and 12.29 ng TEQ/g (dry weight). Relative potency ranges estimated by EROD assay in the medical incinerator ashes were 3.8-17.6 times higher than the results of conventional chemical analysis. EOX analysis suggested that ash samples contained plenty of organochlorine compounds apart from chlorinated dioxins. In addition, medical waste incinerator ashes were considered to have relatively higher amount of organoiodine compounds. In the cleaned-up fractions, bioassay potency ranges were lower than those in the crude extracts. However, some samples still exhibited higher potency than expected from chemical analysis. Though some polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons were found in the fractions, the amounts were relatively low (0.39-10.56 ng/g). The results imply that some bioactive organohalogens that cannot be detected in the conventional chemical analysis might have potential for dioxin-like toxicity, and contribute to higher bioassay activities. The combination of the chemical analysis with the bioassay and EOX provides rough figure of dioxin-like toxicity and suggests types of organohalogen compounds that should be identified as a part of dioxin analysis for control emission from an incineration plant. (C) 2003 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
